review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2021
name: CoolBoomer
title: Lots of Germs To Work For Your Gut
review: The Proud Origins Pro-10 has a great assortment of beneficial bacteria, not just the ones made from milk. These are fast-dissolving capsules taken 2 per day, so a 120-cap bottle is good for 2 months. Reasonably priced, and no funky smell or burp/taste. It is not easy to find affordable probiotics with this assortment of bacteria, so 5 stars for sure.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2021
name: roxycowgirl
title: Use them when taking antibiotics and work well
review: They work for me.I keep probiotics on hand to use with antibiotics.I recently had a horse requiring a ln antibiotic and the vet told me the human probiotics were a cheaper and better fit than the equine ones on the market.Since they require 3 times as much as I do I like the multi pack.I feel like the larger size is also more bang for your buck and better for the horses as well.I haven’t noticed any stomach discomfort when I was taken them.The horses didn’t seem to act any different either.They work well for me and I would buy them again.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2021
name: Eduarda Pantaleao
title: Great Product at a Great Price definitely recommend!!!
review: I love this probiotic, my stomach has gotten a lot better since I began taking it. I definitely recommend this probiotic!

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2021
name: Dee
title: Require Refrigeration
review: The Proud Origins Pro-10, Probiotic gives 20 billion CFU in a two-capsule dose, and has a good variety of strains listed. Be aware that the bottle states to refrigerate after opening, which I did not because my usual brand and others I have tried did not require refrigeration. The capsules are large-ish, but easy to swallow. Taking a two-capsule dose is working ok, but not quite as well as the one-pearl dose of my usual brand.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2021
name: Strategos
title: Not a great probiotic for me personally
review: I've tried lots of probiotics over the years, and I would rank this near the bottom. My stomach doesn't feel better after consuming, it feels worse. The pills are large and seem to upset my stomach.I'm not getting the gut improvements I get with other brands.I don't know the reasons why. Is it the milk ingredients? Is it the quality? Is it the freshness? No idea. I just know this supplement doesn't agree with me and I'm not seeing gut improvement.
